item.description:
Do your heart some good this winter and celebrate the work of NOFA/Mass at Nourish Restaurant in Lexington.

The restaurant sources local and organic produce. The menu is filled with healthy choices and all kinds of great grains and veggies.

Welcoming special guest, Kristin Canty, Director of the documentary film, Farmageddon

Ticket Prices*:
Wine-Tasting: $20 NOFA Member, $25 Non-member
Dinner: $50 Member, $55 Non-member
Evening Package, both Tasting and Dinner:
$60 Member, $70 Non-member

Wine Tasting: 5:30 PM

3-Course Dinner: 7:00 PM

Nourish Founder Karen Masterson has had a passion for social justice and environmental issues for over 30 years. CLICK HERE for a peak at Nourish’s weekly dinner menu.
item.name: Wine Tasting and Dinner at Nourish Restaurant with Kristin Canty
